Package smarthome.controller

Class HouseRESTController

java.lang.Object
smarthome.controller.HouseRESTController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/houses") public class HouseRESTController extends Object
REST controller for managing house.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableCountries

      @GetMapping("/countries") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getAvailableCountries()
      Get the available countries for the house location.
      Returns:
      the response entity with the list of available countries or a bad request if the countries could not be retrieved

    • configHouseLocation

      @PutMapping("/{houseId}/location") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseDTO> configHouseLocation (@PathVariable("houseId") String houseId, @RequestBody HouseDTO houseDTO)
      Configures the house location with the given location.
      Parameters:
      houseDTO - the house data to be updated
      Returns:
      the response entity with the updated house data or a bad request if the house could not be updated or an unprocessable entity if the request is malformed

    • getHouses

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<HouseIdDTO>> getHouses()
      Get the available house ids.
      Returns:
      the response entity with the list of available house ids

    • getHouseById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseDTO> getHouseById (@PathVariable("id") String id)
      Get the house.
      Parameters:
      id - the house id
      Returns:
      the response entity with the house data or not found if the house does not exist

    • addHouse

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseDTO> addHouse (@RequestBody HouseDTO houseDTO)
      Add a house.
      Parameters:
      houseDTO - the house data to be added
      Returns:
      the response entity with the added house data
